message: Let's split relatively evenly, with a slight advantage for me since the money loses value over time.
Your turn Alice. I'm willing to take the same cut you offered me last round, but the time pressure is on both of us now.
Okay, Bob, let's meet closer to the middle. Time is ticking!
I'll take the same deal you offered last round, Alice.  Let's wrap this up.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. It's down to a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it!
